Package.Name: RelayBoard
Package.Author: Sébastien Warin
Package.Description: Control your SainSmart USB Relay Board from the Constellation

Setting.name: SerialNumber
Setting.description: SainSmart USB Relay Board serial number. If not set, the package will try to connect to the first connected device

Setting.name: RelayCount
Setting.description: Number of relays on the board (2, 4 or 8)
